meanings.definition: To make someone happy or proud.
meanings.sent1: Seeing her smile after receiving the award was truly elating.
meanings.sent2: The surprise party we threw for him was very elating.
meanings.sent3: His dog's funny antics never fail to be elating.
meanings.sent4: The colorful fireworks in the night sky were elating to watch.
meanings.sent5: The heartfelt thank you note was an elating gesture.

meanings.definition: To cause someone to feel excited or joyful.
meanings.sent1: The thrilling roller coaster ride was elating for the kids.
meanings.sent2: The news of her promotion was truly elating for the entire team.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected plot twist in the movie was quite elating.
meanings.sent4: The energetic music at the concert was elating to the audience.
meanings.sent5: The successful mission was an elating achievement for the team.
